course.subject: TEMG
course.name: T&M IBPC Startup Project: AI for Business - IBPC in Hamburg
course.description: The purpose of the IBPC is to create an opportunity for aspiring young students to work in a multicultural environment to develop an innovative business leveraging breakthroughs in technology and business to impact human living conditions. This course is jointly-offered with University of Illinois U-C, University of Bayreuth, National Tsing Hua University and HKUST T&M-DDP Program. The case challenge is how might we utilize advancements in Artificial Intelligence to create a startup that offers business enterprise solution that is customer desirable, financially viable and technically feasible. Instructor consent is required for this course.
